review: Oasia Resort Sentosa sekarang menjadi salah satu hotel favorit saya! Kami disambut dengan upgrade gratis ke junior suite karena anak saya ulang tahun dan minuman selamat datang. Ruangan itu dirancang dan dirawat dengan indah. Hotel ini di depan stasiun Imbiah yang sangat nyaman! Kami pergi ke pantai bukannya kolam renang hotel. Sarapannya enak! Terakhir, staf sangat ramah dan membantu! Terima kasih untuk pengalaman menginap yang sempurna! Pasti akan merekomendasikan!
Lokasi bagus. Bisa lebih baik jika pintu toilet geser tidak tembus pandang dan bisa dikunci. pengalaman yang baik secara keseluruhan. sangat bersih dan pengalaman tinggal di kamar bergaya kolonial.

Service and accommodation was superb!!! The staff greeted us right from the moment we stepped out of our car. Helped us to park the car while we check-in. The counter staff escorted us up to our room, even offered to show us the facilities. We truly enjoyed our stay at the Junior Suite. Will definitely come back whenever we need a recharge.

The biggest plus about Oasia is the location, conveniently located across the road from the Imbiah station, which makes exploration of the island very convenient. Service is warm and prompt mostly, except the hiccup where the front desk staff told us to wait for the car to be driven out from car park and after waiting for 15mins, we realised that the valet did not receive the instructions to retrieve the car. That was quickly rectified, but the communications can be improved. The sliding door to our bathroom keeps sliding open by itself, which can be inconvenient when one is using the toilet/shower and there are others in the room.
